xsl:element.name: setting
xsl:element.xsl:text: Where and when the scene takes place: Interior or Exterior? location? time of day (day or night)? Paint a picture of the surroundings, the ambiance, any relevant objects or features and initial states of characters.

xsl:element.name: introduction
xsl:element.xsl:text: Write the words a narrator would use to introduce this scene

xsl:element.name: illustration
xsl:element.xsl:text: Pick an important character or an important object vividly describe it so it can be illustrated. Pick someone or something you have not picked and described before. Make the description self contained because our illustrator will only see your description and nothing else. Names of characters etc. will not mean anything to them.

xsl:element.name: illustration_title
xsl:element.xsl:text: Pick a short funny title to accompany the illustration you described above.

xsl:element.name: music
xsl:element.xsl:text: Vividly describe music that matches the mood, location and gives context to this scene. Make the description self contained because our musician will only see your description and nothing else.

xsl:element.name: abc_music
xsl:element.xsl:text: Compose a suitable background music tune for this scene using ABC music notation.

xsl:element.name: protagonist_reaction
xsl:element.xsl:text: Briefly describe a single different way the protagonist can react to the situation described in this scene. If asked to propose more than one reaction make all reactions as different as possible from each other and make sure some are bad and some are good. Do not mention reactions are choices or options.
